about_the_game:
These 16 historically authentic models also have new animations, for a more realistic and improved game atmosphere. Units are equipped with swords, shields, daggers, armour, chain mail, jerkins, capes, basinets and pig face basinets.

Key Features:

This spritepack includes 16 new sprites for the Eastern Europeans in the 15th century of EUIII. There are unique uniforms for:
  • Russia
  • Poland
  • Muscowy
  • Novgorod
  • Lithuania
  • Riga
  • Hungary
  • Ryazan
  • Pskov
  • Byzantium
  • Tver
  • Yaroslavl
  • Mazowia
  • Serbia
  • Bosnia
  • And a generic one

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Microsoft Windows XP/2000/Vista
  • Processor: 1.9GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 512MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Video Card and support for Pixelshader 2.0
  • DirectX®: 9.0c or better
  • Hard Drive: 1.0GB
  • Sound: DirectX7 compatible sound card
